languages.text: "Критическая ситуация требует решительных действий. Я не могу позволить каждому сведущему техножрецу нестись сломя голову на смерть, стоит ему услышать про угрозу святой реликвии. Мне нужен кто-то, знающий больше пары славословий Омниссии, кто приглядит за столицей и миллионами ее обитателей".

"A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."
languages.original_text: "Критическая ситуация требует решительных действий. Я не могу позволить каждому сведущему техножрецу нестись сломя голову на смерть, стоит ему услышать про угрозу святой реликвии. Мне нужен кто-то, знающий больше пары славословий Омниссии, кто приглядит за столицей и миллионами ее обитателей".

traits.locale_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and the millions of its citizens."

"A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and the millions of its citizens."

"A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

"A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

languages.text: "Eine kritische Situation erfordert entschlossenes Handeln. Ich kann einfach nicht jeden ausgebildeten Techpriester in den sicheren Tod rennen lassen, sobald er von einem gefährdeten Relikt erfährt. Ich brauche Leute, die mehr tun können, als den Omnissiah zu bitten, auf die Hauptstadt und einige Millionen Einwohner zu achten."
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: "Eine kritische Situation erfordert entschlossenes Handeln. Ich kann einfach nicht jeden ausgebildeten Techpriester in den sicheren Tod rennen lassen, sobald er von einem gefährdeten Relikt erfährt. Ich brauche Leute, die mehr tun können, als den Omnissiah zu bitten, auf die Hauptstadt und einige Millionen Einwohner zu achten.

languages.text: « À situation critique, mesure décisive. Je ne puis me permettre de laisser tous les technoprêtres érudits partir au-devant de la mort dès qu'ils entendent parler d'une relique en danger. J'ai besoin de gens capables de faire plus que prier l'Omnimessie de protéger la capitale et ses millions d'habitants. »
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: « À situation critique, mesure décisive. Je ne puis me permettre de laisser tous les technoprêtres érudits partir au-devant de la mort dès qu'ils entendent parler d'une relique en danger. J'ai besoin de gens capables de faire plus que prier l'Omnimessie de protéger la capitale et ses millions d'habitants. »

languages.text: “非常时期需要采取非常手段。我不能放任那些博学的技术神甫一听到圣物处于危险之中，就匆匆忙忙地过去送死。我需要那些不仅仅只会称赞欧姆尼塞亚的人。我需要他们的力量照顾我的首都，还有这里的几百万公民。”
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: “非常时期需要采取非常手段。我不能放任那些博学的技术祭司一听到圣物处于危险之中，就匆匆忙忙地过去送死。我需要那些不仅仅只会称赞欧姆尼塞亚的人。我需要他们的力量照顾我的首都，还有这里的几百万公民。”

languages.text: 「危機的状況においては思い切った行動も必要でしょう。博識な技術司祭が危険に晒されている聖遺物のことを耳にした瞬間に死地に向かうようなことを私は断じて容認できません。万機神が首都と数百万の市民の守神であると賞賛するだけではなく、それ以上の何かができる者が必要なのです」
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: 「危機的状況においては思い切った行動も必要でしょう。博識な技術司祭が危険に晒されている聖遺物のことを耳にした瞬間に死地に向かうようなことを私は断じて容認できません。万機神が首都と数百万の市民の守神であると賞賛するだけではなく、それ以上の何かができる者が必要なのです」

languages.text: «Una situación crítica requiere una decisión firme. No puedo dejar que todos los tecnosacerdotes se dirijan hacia su propia muerte en cuanto oigan hablar de que hay una reliquia en peligro. Necesito gente que sepa hacer algo más que alabar al Omnissiah para cuidar de la capital y de los millones de sus ciudadanos».
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: «Una situación crítica requiere una decisión firme. No puedo dejar que todos los tecnosacerdotes se dirijan hacia su propia muerte en cuanto oigan hablar de que hay una reliquia en peligro. Necesito gente que sepa hacer algo más que alabar al Omnissiah para cuidar de la capital y de los millones de sus ciudadanos».

languages.text: "Olağanüstü durumlar olağanüstü kararlar gerektirir. İrfan sahibi Tekno Rahiplerin sırf bir yadigâr tehlikede diye ölüme koşmalarına göz yumamam. Başkente ve milyonlarca vatandaşına göz kulak olması için Hermesih'e dua etmekten fazlasını yapanlara ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: "A critical situation calls for decisive action. I simply cannot let every learned Tech-Priest go to their death the moment they hear about an endangered relic. I need people who can do more than praise the Omnissiah to look after the capital and its millions of citizens."

traits.locale_text: "Olağanüstü durumlar olağanüstü kararlar gerektirir. İrfan sahibi Tekno Rahiplerin sırf bir yadigâr tehlikede diye ölüme koşmalarına göz yumamam. Başkente ve milyonlarca vatandaşına göz kulak olması için Hermesih'e dua etmekten fazlasını yapanlara ihtiyacım var."
